# ğŸ“¦ Taktkit

**Taktkit** is a lightweight JavaScript toolkit to build beautiful, data-driven dashboards with minimal configuration. Designed for flexibility and fast integration, Taktkit provides a set of utilities to render charts, handle JSON datasets, and build responsive visualizations for agile metrics, product tracking, or general analytics.

## ğŸš€ Features

- ğŸ“Š Render bar, pie, and line charts with zero boilerplate
- ğŸ¨ Custom color support per category/year/status
- ğŸ“ Load data directly from JSON embedded in `<script>` tags or fetched dynamically
- ğŸ” Smart support for dashboards with filters
- ğŸ§© Modular and framework-agnostic (no dependencies)
- ğŸŒ Works with Flask, Django, Express, static HTML, etc.
